resources.string: Grand River Transit details for the Region of Waterloo, Ontario, Canada.\n\nAll data for this application is freely available in Google GTFS format from http://www.grt.ca
Sorry, don\'t have a location fix!
There is no current schedule data on your system, perhaps because it expired. Please update your app!

Use the search facility from the menu to find stops, and long-press to add them to your favourites list. Long press from the map also works. Then a couple of clicks is all that\'s needed to find the time of the next bus.\n\nTo remove a favourite, long-press on the favourites list.
Swipe left to show all routes, or tap to show one.
No routes use this stop in the current schedule.
